code: const initState={fruits:[]};export default function Reducer(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;if(action.type==='ADD'){console.log(state);return{fruits:[...state.fruits,action.element]};}if(action.type==='VIDER'){return{fruits:[]};}return state;}
